results.name: a(n) = gcd(sigma(n+1), sigma(n)) = gcd(A000203(n+1), A000203(n)).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Table[GCD[DivisorSigma[1, n + 1], DivisorSigma[1, n]] , {n, 1, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 03 2017 *)
program: (PARI) t=1; for (n=1, 1000, s=sigma(n+1); write("b060780.txt", n, " ", gcd(s, t)); t=s) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 11 2009
